CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 5, 1955, pg. 1A reads: "Promoted - With Mayor David L. Lawrence administering the oath of office, Wednesday, Karl O. Jackson, left, became a police lieutenant, and, Albert L. Mills and Matthew Geis, right, became city detectives, as, left to right, City Councilman Paul F. Jones, Mrs. Sarah Kirk, Thirteenth Ward Democratic chairman and alderman; Public Safety Director David Olbum and Police Superintendent James W. Slusser observe. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence administering oath of office to Lieutenant Karl O. Jackson and Detectives Albert Laverne Mills and Matthew Geis, while City Councilman Paul F. Jones, Alderman Sarah Kirk, Public Safety Director David Olbum and Police Superintendent James W. Slusser observed, standing in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers at the City County Building
